attributes.action: Home office should Remove all visa fees which are due to expire this year 2020
attributes.additional_details: As Covid-19 had an impact on everyone around the world regardles their status of immigration where some people were not able to claim any grant include UC because of immigration status, for that reason all visa fees should be canceled by end of this year ,so people can get back to work again and start saving for visa fees which are huge amounts
attributes.background: Home office should remove all visa fees for at least end of this year which are due to expire until end of this year 2020 so people can get back to work and start saving for visa fees , which are huge amounts

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

Home Office to offer one year visa extensions without applications being made: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310387
Scrap in-country visa Extension fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/310356
